brief_title: A Comparison of Seroquel vs. Risperidone in Schizophrenia
brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to show equal efficacy of both quetiapine and risperidone in subjects treated with study medication for up to 8 weeks.
criteria: Inclusion Criteria - Male / Female, 18-65 years old - Schizophrenia (as per DSM IV) Exclusion Criteria - Concurrent use of psychotropic medication - Does not fulfill moderately ill on CGI
